Window.onMouseUp

Function/Meaning
Mouse button released
Type
Event of Window class
Syntax
onMouseUp(x, y, button, shift)
Arguments
x The x-coordinate (in client coordinates) where the mouse button was released.
y The y-coordinate (in client coordinates) where the mouse button was released.
button The mouse button that was released. It will be one of the following values:
mbLeft : Left mouse button was released
mbMiddle : Middle mouse button was released
mbRight : Right mouse button was released
mbX1 : Mouse side key 1st button was released
mbX2 : Mouse side key 2nd button was released
shift The state of the shift keys pressed at the same time the mouse button was released. It will be a combination of the following values using bitwise OR:
ssAlt : ALT key was pressed
ssShift : SHIFT key was pressed
ssCtrl : CTRL key was pressed
Description
Occurs when a mouse button is released.
